Jobs.title: Regional Practice Manager - Retail, Consumer Goods, Transport & Government
Jobs.description: ', '    Driving the testing services solutions across the; Retail, Consumer Goods, Transport & Government sector', '', 'Wipro Technologies, the global IT business of Wipro Limited (NYSE:WIT) is a leading Information Technology, Consulting and Outsourcing company, that delivers solutions to enable its clients do business better. Wipro Technologies delivers winning business outcomes through its deep industry experience and a 360 degree view of “Business through Technology” – helping clients create successful and adaptive businesses. A company recognised globally for its comprehensive portfolio of services, a practitioner’s approach to delivering innovation and an organization wide commitment to sustainability, Wipro Technologies has 130,000 employees and clients across 54 countries.', '

summary: ', '    A committed, energetic and self-motivated software & services sales professional.  Excellent relationship, interpersonal and organisational management skills.  Possessing considerable IT sales, technical, architectural, design and business management experience having worked all sides of the IT industry, as vendor, services provider and end user.  Has managed territories across Europe also jointly with partner organisations and directly for UK, US, Indian, European and other International companies. Effective in a multi-cultural environment. An accomplished team player, motivator and effective communicator. Very “customer-facing” with strong relationship skills.', '
